['Changed damage type against ranged units from HP Removal to Physical.', 'Now deals the damage dealt to ranged units to melee units as well.
This means it deals 5/10/15/20 damage to melee units upon attack start, and then 10/20/30/40 again upon reaching attack point.', ' Return
Changed damage type against ranged units from HP Removal to Physical.
Now deals the damage dealt to ranged units to melee units as well.
This means it deals 5/10/15/20 damage to melee units upon attack start, and then 10/20/30/40 again upon reaching attack point.']
